jobDescription: Data Scientist  If you are a Ph. D, Data Scientist with Ad-Tech experience, please read on!  Based in beautiful Santa Monica, California we are a cutting edge video ad-tech company who is obsessed with data and equally obsessed with ensuring a work culture of fulfillment, engagement, and high performance. We are backed by 8 top venture capital firms which contribute to our rapidly growing 100+ person startup. Right now, we are looking for a few Data Scientists to join the team. Your work will directly influence the the tools we're building such as audience behavior prediction, forecasting, and allocation. Top Reasons to Work with Us
